name: Ragnarok Fishing
description:
The gods have turned on humankind...

Can you delay the end of the world by sacrificing massive amounts of fish?

Originally made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 35: Vikings.

Theme: Vikings

Limitation: Game must take place at sea

Controls:

  • Hold to charge throw
  • Aim with mouse
  • (wait until your weapon flashes red and becomes bigger, that's when it's fully charged)
  • Release to throw weapon at fish

Tools and libraries:

  • Unity
  • DOTween
  • LeanPool
  • Responsive WebGL Template
  • Unity Movement AI

Credits:

  • Particle Pack by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
  • Norse font by Joel Carrouche www.joelcarrouche.net
  • EB Garamond font https://github.com/octaviopardo/EBGaramond12/blob/master/OFL.txt
  • Music from https://filmmusic.io
